AboutMe.name: Eloy sandoval
AboutMe.pAboutMe: As an organized and highly motivated person, I am able to adapt to any circumstance and always give my best in any project, while at the same time making an effort to work as a team and promote values ​​such as camaraderie, if you want you can contact me. You will find all my information in the contact area.

Project.DescriptionUsers: Responsive web application that allows comprehensive user management, facilitating their creation, editing and deletion efficiently.
Project.DescriptionWeather: A weather app, that shows the temperatures in C° and F°, and the weather in your location with a weather Api
Project.DescriptionCard: Interactive application that generates cards with inspiring phrases from historical figures, offering learning and entertainment.
Project.DescriptionPokedex: Interactive Pokedex that queries a public API to list all species offering search, filters and detailed records.
Project.DescriptionSampdoria: App designed for an amateur soccer club and to keep the fans informed
Project.DescriptionEcommerce: Application that consumes an electronics products API, integrating various functionalities to explore, manage and visualize data.
Project.DescriptionSomosawaq: This platform showcases the work of the non-profit organization Awaq, which is dedicated to promoting sustainable development.
Project.DescriptionCongreso: We show the details of the second international congress on sustainable development organized by Awaq.
